DOC.brief_summary: Phase 1 , Multiple Dose Study MPC-6827 Subjects Refractory Solid Tumors .
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 , Multiple Dose Study MPC-6827 Subjects With Refractory Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: 1 . Advanced Metastatic Cancer 2 . Measurable / Evaluable Disease 3 . Karnofsky score great equal 70 % 4 . Adequate Hematology / Organ function 5 . No Baseline peripheral central neuropathy grade 1 1 . Hypersensitivity Cremophor EL 2 . Pregnant Lactating 3 . Spinal Cord Compression 4 . Preexisting Dementia / Cognitive Disfunction 5 . Require Neupogen Neulasta Maintain Neutrophil Count 6 . Have Primary Brain Cancer 7 . Have history Ischemic Heart Disease 8 . Have Diabetes
